content: “Harassment” I guess. (Though clearly the harassment runs both ways, unless Medium only picks and chooses what they deem “harassment.”) Alas, as for Medium, I have no more fucks to give. I will only be using this platform to keep up with the writers I like. I’m not sure what beyond that, at this point. This situation left me with a bad taste that I can not get out of my mouth. Not to beat a dead horse, but they made it very clear through their actions as of late how they feel about people who have devoted a great deal of time, energy and creative capacity to build their platform — and I am by no means speaking solely of myself. Bad taste, ya’ll. Bad taste. Even Listerine ain’t getting this shit out of my mouth.
